>>> import broadcast_cal_utils
>>> for year in range(2020, 2100):
...     for quarter in range(1, 5):
...         start, end = broadcast_cal_utils.broadcast_quarter_dates(year, quarter)
...         print(f'{year} Q{quarter}:  {start} - {end}')
...     print('---')
...
2020 Q1:  2019-12-30 - 2020-03-29
2020 Q2:  2020-03-30 - 2020-06-28
2020 Q3:  2020-06-29 - 2020-09-27
2020 Q4:  2020-09-28 - 2020-12-27
---
